name: Avocados and Almonds
author: Andrea Lee Ryan
summary: Super fast! I think this makes a nice energy boost after a workout, but I often serve it when friends are dropping by as a quick appetizer. You can substitute an interesting salt, use salt substitute, add roasted garlic, etc. There are numerous possibilities.
ingredients: 2  Haas avocados - peeled, pitted, and sliced
½ cup slivered almonds, finely chopped
directions: Arrange avocado slices on a platter or several appetizer plates
Melt butter in a small skillet over medium-high heat until butter begins to bubble and foam
Cook and stir chopped almonds in hot butter until golden and fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes
Transfer almonds to a paper towel-lined plate to cool
Top each avocado slice with almonds and sea salt
